name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hacker Whos - Hide Hacker News Usernames

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace every username in Hacker News with '?????'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curiosity killed the cat, so we’ve decided that it’s just better not to know. “Hacker Who’s” hides every username on Hacker News as the ultimate way to emphasize the content over the user account.

We like to pretend that every account is a close friend.

Made with <3 by Agency Enterprise as part of Same Day Skunkworks.
